<<<<<<< HEAD
A balade declaryng how neybourhed lone [sic], and trew dealyng is gone Barker, John, ballad writer.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
By Richard Lant, Imprinted at London : [1561]
A ballad. Publication from STC. Verse - "Now straunge it is, to men of age". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
